snippet: The death of an unarmed black man who died two days after South Florida police officers shocked him with a Taser has been ruled a homicide by the Broward County medical examiner.
abstract: Broward County, Fla, medical examiner rules death of Calvon Reid, unarmed black man who was shocked with Taser by police and subsequently died, as homicide.
lead_paragraph: The death of an unarmed black man who died two days after South Florida police officers shocked him with a Taser has been ruled a homicide by the Broward County medical examiner.

headline.main: Florida: Man’s Taser Death Is Ruled a Homicide
headline.print_headline: Florida: Man’s Taser Death Is Ruled a Homicide
